contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | birth_name = Jason James Ritcher | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1980|1|29}} | birth_place = [[Medford, Oregon]], U.S. | occupation = Actor | Notable works and roles = '''Jesse''' in ''[[Free Willy]]'' | years_active = 1993â€“present | website = | notable role = '''Jesse''' in ''[[Free Willy]]'' }} '''Jason James Richter''' (born January 29, 1980 in [[Medford, Oregon]]) is an American actor. ==Early life== At the age of three, he and his family moved to [[Hawaii]], where a Japanese casting agency discovered him and signed him up for three TV spots. In 1989, his family moved back to [[Los Angeles]], where he could pursue his career. ==Career== He starred in ''[[Free Willy]]'' in 1993, in which he was chosen out of more than 4,000 candidates to play the lead role of Jesse.<ref>http://www.people.com/people/archive/article/0,,20101327,00.html</ref> Other movies include ''[[Cops & Robbersons]]'', ''[[The NeverEnding Story III]]'', ''[[Free Willy 2: The Adventure Home]]'', ''[[Laserhawk]]'', ''[[Free Willy 3: The Rescue]]'', and ''The Setting Son''. He also made a cameo appearance in the music video for [[Michael Jackson]]'s "[[Scream/Childhood|Childhood]]". His most recent [[film]] appearance was in ''[[Ricochet River]]'', along with [[John Cullum]]. Between the ''Free Willy'' roles, he had [[television|TV]] guest roles on ''[[Sabrina, the Teenage Witch (TV series)|Sabrina, the Teenage Witch]]'' and ''[[The Client (TV series)|The Client]]''. He is currently the bassist for the band ''Fermata''.<ref>http://www.themodernage.org/2008/01/25/where-are-they-now-jason-james-richter/</ref> He is an avid fan of the [[Jacksonville Jaguars]].<ref>http://movies.yahoo.com/blogs/the-projector/don-t-forget-free-willy-bigger-less-cute-195256371.html</ref> ==Notes== {{reflist}} ==External links== * {{IMDb name|0725284}} {{Young Artist Award for Best Leading Young Actor in a Feature Film (1991-2010)}} {{Authority control|VIAF=59295856}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Richter, Jason James | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American actor | DATE OF BIRTH =January 29, 1980 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Medford, Oregon]], U.S. | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Richter, Jason James}} [[Category:1980 births]] [[Category:American child actors]] [[Category:American film actors]] [[Category:American television actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Medford, Oregon]] [[Category:Musicians from New Jersey]] [[Category:Young Artist Award winners]] {{US-screen-actor-1980s-stub}}
